scripts.setup: npm install && npm run bootstrap && npm run init:env
scripts.bootstrap: npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix runner install
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n landing,server,runner -c cyan,blue,magenta "npm run landing" "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix runner run dev"
scripts.dev:phase2: concurrently -k -n server,runner,ui -c blue,magenta,green "PORT=3201 RUNNER_URL=http://localhost:3202 RUNNER_TOKEN=test_runner_token_123 CORS_ORIGIN=http://localhost:3200 npm --prefix server run dev" "PORT=3202 RUNNER_PERSIST=false RUNNER_TOKEN=test_runner_token_123 CORS_ORIGIN=http://localhost:3200 npm --prefix runner run dev" "PORT=3200 NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://localhost:3201 RUNNER_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3202 RUNNER_TOKEN=test_runner_token_123 npm --prefix ui run dev:phase2"
scripts.build: npm run bootstrap && npm --prefix server run build && npm --prefix runner run build && npm --prefix ui run build
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n landing,server,runner -c cyan,blue,magenta "npm run landing" "npm --prefix server start" "npm --prefix runner start"
scripts.smoke: npm run init:env && npm --prefix server run smoke && npm --prefix runner run smoke && npm --prefix ui run smoke
scripts.smoke:phase2: BASE_URL=http://localhost:3201 npm --prefix server run smoke && RUNNER_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3202 npm --prefix runner run smoke && BASE_URL=http://localhost:3200 npm --prefix ui run smoke
